title: Nikhil Malik
subtitle: Technical Lead at Webmd
bio: Hello, my name is Nikhil Malik. I was born in the early 90s and am happily married. I am also soon to be a father.
career:
Nikhil is a Software Engineer who has been working as a Technical lead at Webmd since mid-2019. 

He leads the Univadis team, which is responsible for the EU regions (France, Spain, Italy, Germany, and .com) and focuses on the development of features and management of the API that serves web and mobile content. 

Nikhil is interested in staying up-to-date with new technologies, particularly in the areas of web development, frontend, and backend. 

Prior to working at Webmd, Nikhil worked at Webkul, where he provided solutions to customers in the e-commerce industry, including the development of Marketplace, Auction, RMA, Payment integration, and other solutions. 

He and his team were also responsible for the organization's entry into the SaaS business, which began with the development of Uvdesk, Booking Commerce, and other products.
